title: What The...I Did Not Sign Up For This: The Ups and Downs of Supporting an Entrepreneur
features: Gabi Sprake and her husband, Colin have experienced the gamut of emotional highs and lows while running multiple businesses over the course of their 20-year marriage, while successfully maintaining a healthy marriage and happy family life. Read first-hand about their breaking points and how they managed to stay afloat emotionally and financially. What The…I Did Not Sign Up For This: The Ups and Downs of Supporting An Entrepreneur is a sneak peek into the world of entrepreneurship from someone who has been in the support role for two decades.This book is for you if are a spouse, significant other, partner, child, or working in an entrepreneurial organization. This raw, unfiltered look at the ups and downs of entrepreneurial life and the impact it can have on your home, business and relationship will finally help you gain insight into the unique mindset of an entrepreneur.
description: Gabi has been supporting her entrepreneurial husband for over 20 years, and she is the first person to write about the journey of supporting an entrepreneur. She has done an exceptional job, and if you are supporting an entrepreneur in any way, this book is absolutely essential to truly understand what it takes.
The Success Principles(TM) How to Get from Where You Are to Where You Want to Be

Gabi is an exceptional woman, mom, sister and partner. Born and raised in Springs, South Africa, Gabi grew up in an entrepreneurial household, observing firsthand her mother's unwavering support of her father, whose shoe company has been in operation for nearly 60 years. Gabi is a qualified aesthetician and has spent years working in spas around the world, promoting some of the most prominent skincare brands from France, Germany and Spain. She "decided" (not really by choice) to join her husband, Colin, in their business Make Your Mark Training and Consulting Inc. in January 2009 and has been involved running the financial side of the business ever since. Gabi is one of the kindest and most dynamic women you will ever meet. She takes into consideration all aspects of every situation before moving forward, something that has supported Colin to achieve the success as the visionary behind their business. Gabi resides in South Surrey, British Columbia with two amazing teenage daughters and has just celebrated her 20th wedding anniversary with her best friend, Colin.
